properties.entry: INSERT INTO USER_TABLE U VALUES ( INDEX??? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT , ? , 'N' , '2' , 'N' , NULL , ? )
SELECT U.USER_PWD FROM USER_TABLE U WHERE U.WITHDRAW_YN = 'N' AND U.USER_ID = ?

SELECT U.USER_CODE , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_PHONE , U.USER_ADDRESS , U.POINT , U.USER_EMAIL , U.WITHDRAW_YN , U.ROLE_CODE , U.BLACKLIST_YN , U.BLACKLIST_DATE , U.USER_NO FROM USER_TABLE U WHERE U.WITHDRAW_YN = 'N' AND U.USER_ID = ?
INSERT INTO PICTURE VALUES ( SEQ_PICTURE_CODE.NEXTVAL , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , ? , ? , ? )
